thread.title: Colorado theater shooter James Holmes assaulted in prison, officials say
thread.title_full: Colorado theater shooter James Holmes assaulted in prison, officials say

title: Colorado theater shooter James Holmes assaulted in prison, officials say
text:
Published By: Fox News - Today 
An inmate assaulted Colorado theater shooter James Holmes and a security officer at the state penitentiary, officials said Friday....
